title: Minister Amir Muqam mourns demise of journalist Tariq Aziz’s brother
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 10 (APP):Engineer Amir Muqam, Federal Minister for Kashmir Affairs, Safron and Gilgit-Baltistan, as well as President of PML-N Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, expressed profound sorrow over the demise of Salim Nawaz, the younger brother of senior journalist Tariq Aziz.
In a condolence message, federal minister expressed deep sympathy with senior journalist and his family over the loss of their loved one.
He prayed for the departed soul’s forgiveness and for the bereaved family to find strength and patience in this time of grief.
